--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Per Jacobsson <perjacobsson@...> wrote:
>
> I=
 just tried out the plug-in on some of my projects and the metrics
look int=
eresting.
> 
> One quick suggestion: Some filtering functionality would be =
nice,
perhaps just the ability to exclude certain packages from the reports=
.
Right now, one-shot code that I know is crap, and already scheduled to
be=
 deprecated or deleted, of course shows up at the top of the list.
That mak=
es it harder to spot the methods that really need to be looked at.
> / Per
=

Hi Per, thank you for trying Crap4J, and thank you for your feedback.
The =
ability to exclude known crappy code is a popular request and we
are evalua=
ting the cleanest way to do that.  You can check the
following blog entry: =


http://www.crap4j.org/news/?p=3D20

Thanks again for the feedback.

Alber=
